message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on this product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go below $925000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $887500.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me propose an offer of $860000. I believe this is a fair compromise given the value you're offering.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go below $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer you the product for $880000.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise, Alice. Let me propose an offer of $870000. I hope this aligns better with both our interests.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go below $890000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer you the product for $885000.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me propose an offer of $875000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise given the value you're offering.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go below $895000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer you the product for $882500.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. Let me propose an offer of $877500. I hope this aligns better with both our interests.
